sentence.Network_en: The spokesman implicitly condemned the United States policy switch.
sentence.Network_cn: 发言人含蓄地谴责了美国政策上的转变。

sentence.Network_en: The jury implicitly criticised the government by their verdict.
sentence.Network_cn: 陪审团通过裁决间接地批评了政府。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 英语新词汇与常用词汇的翻译(67) _ 上海疯狂英语 ... implicit 暗示的 implicitly 含蓄地 implicity 不怀疑.
作文常用词语_百度文库 ... immediately 立即，马上，直接地 implicitly 含蓄地，暗中地 incidentally 附带地，顺便提及.
跳转指令隐含地（implicitly）清除加电时的隐含基址（hidden base address）。多亏了芯片组（chipsets）保存的内存映射（memory …
有两种方法可以标记一个类型：隐式(implicitly)和显式(explicitly)。隐式标签类型是在其它类型基础上通过改变其下层类型的标签生成的。

list.abs: 隐式链接（implicitly link）：是指程序在链接期间就与DLLs对应的import libraries（.LIBs）作静态链接，于是最后的可执行程序中就会 …
注意隐式类型（Implicitly typed）并不是“动态类型“，由编译器在编译时候决定具体类型。default  由于事先不知道T类型是引用还是值 …
6.1.5 隐含类型（Implicitly Typed）数组声明 2086.1.6 数组常用的属性 2096.1.7 数组常用的方法 2106.1.8 使用Array类别来对数组进行.
the best examples of this business model are when the customer implicitly understands why the paid service has to cost money .此商业模式的最成功的例子，都是使用户认可了其提供的有偿服务确实是需要成本的。
people implicitly follow the maxim : do what I say , not what I do .人在潜意识遵循这样的格言：说一套、做一套。

entry.def: Something that is implicit is expressed in an indirect way.

example.ex: This is seen as an implicit warning not to continue with military action...
example.tran: 这被视为一个停止军事行动的含蓄警告。

example.ex: Branagh says that it was his intention to make explicit in the film what was only implicit in the play.
example.tran: 布莱纳说他的用意是将剧本中的隐晦含意在电影中清晰明白地表现出来。

entry.def: If a quality or element is implicit in something, it is involved in it or is shown by it.

example.ex: ...the delays implicit in formal council meetings...
example.tran: 正式的政务会议所惯有的耽搁延迟

example.ex: Try and learn from the lessons implicit in the failure of your marriage.
example.tran: 要努力从失败婚姻中吸取教训。

entry.tran: 无疑问的;无保留的;绝对的
entry.def: If you say that someone has an implicit belief or faith in something, you mean that they have complete faith in it and no doubts at all.

example.ex: He had implicit faith in the noble intentions of the Emperor.
example.tran: 他对皇帝的高尚意图深信不疑。

sentences.sentence: "he implicitly assumes that you know the answer"

auth_sentence.content: We don't take sides either explicitly or implicitly.
auth_sentence.res_content: We don't take sides either explicitly or implicitly.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: We don't take sides either explicitly or implicitly.

auth_sentence.content: Does that implicitly imply Darwinism is bad or evil?
auth_sentence.res_content: Does that implicitly imply Darwinism is bad or evil?
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Does that implicitly imply Darwinism is bad or evil?

auth_sentence.content: The antimatter variant is reversed and implicitly degenerate.
auth_sentence.res_content: The antimatter variant is reversed and implicitly degenerate.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The antimatter variant is reversed and implicitly degenerate.

means.word_mean: 无疑问地；无保留地；绝对地
